pkgmetadata.longdescription: Remote R: Control a Remote R Session from a Local One // A set of utilities for controlling a remote R session from a local one. Simply set up a server (see package vignette for more details) and connect to it from your local R session, including 'RStudio'. Network communication is handled by the 'ZeroMQ' library by way of the 'pbdZMQ' package. The client/server framework is a custom 'REPL'.
